products.name: plumbus
products.description: A Plumbus will aid many things in life, making life easier. With proper maintenance, handling, storage, and urging, Plumbus will provide you with a lifetime of better living and happiness

products.name: butter robot
products.description: Small, two armed, mobile robot created for the sole purpose of passing butter

products.name: szechuan sauce
products.description: Szechuan Chicken McNugget Sauce, a dipping sauce sachet for McDonald's Chicken McNuggets. AKA Mulan McNugget Sauce

products.name: microverse battery
products.description: Contains a miniature universe with a planet inhabited by intelligent life. These lifeforms use kinetic devices to produce electricity. Under the guise of "waste power" a majority of the energy produced is extracted to power a small personal spaceship
